description: Jac Morgan says he is 'excited to continue my journey' after signing a new deal with the Ospreys.
title: Wales captain Jac Morgan signs new Ospreys deal
title_page: Wales captain Jac Morgan signs new Ospreys deal - BBC Sport
maintext:
Club captain Jac Morgan has signed a new deal with Ospreys.
Morgan has made 43 appearances for the region since moving from Scarlets ahead of the 2021/2022 season.
He has won 17 Wales caps and co-captained Wales at the 2023 Rugby World Cup.
The 24-year-old will also lead Wales at the 2025 Six Nations.
"I'm excited to continue my journey with the Ospreys, this club has always felt like home to me, ever since I first pulled on the jersey," said Morgan.
"With the players and staff we have in the building, the move to St Helen's next year, it's an exciting time to be part of this club.
"I've loved playing for the Ospreys and feel I've improved as a player since joining here.
"I want to continue that progress by getting better every day and contributing in whatever way I can in getting this club to where it needs to be."
